The LabCam Application

LabCam enables to easily capture scientific research data like photos or videos and various metadata and automatically transfer them to an image repository. The App is for scientists and scientific assistants who collect their research data with mobile devices.

The Application relieves the documentation of research data by providing two different ways for uploading: manual and automatically. The manual upload is recommendable for a small amount of pictures and the automatic upload is for large quantities of data.

LabCam is applicable by creating an account by an imeji instance like gluons or by downloading imeji. Log into LabCam is either with username and password or by scanning your QR-Code.

Install the App

For working with LabCam you have to create a personal account by an imeji instance like gluons. If you are not registred yet, please follow this link for registration.

LabCam is available in the Google Play Store . Please follow this link and you can install LabCam on your mobile device. Be aware that LabCam needs at least Android Version 4.3

You do not have a personal account yet? Go to our webpage and get started with the test account. Just follow the intruction for installing the App and scan the QR-Code for Login. Be aware that the pictures are not durably stored in the test Collection.

Download

Watch us on Github. Download this project in either zip or tar formats.

You can also clone the project with Git by running:

$ git clone https://github.com/MPDL/MPDL-Cam.git

Contact and Support

Get more informationen about LabCam on our webpage.

Feel free to contact us: labcam-support@mpdl.mpg.de
